The 'Fédération Française de Vol à Voile' offers an OpenAir file for the whole
of France at the following websites:

  http://www.ffvvespaceaerien.org/
  http://fichier-ea.ffvv.org/

According to the info on the website, the OpenAir file is compiled by
volunteers from info in the French AIP and updated every 'Cycle AIRAC' (28
days).
